name: SnapEngage plugin
author: SnapEngage

sections.description:
This plugin makes it easy to install and use SnapEngage Live Chat on your WordPress site. Please note: You will need to have an active SnapEngage account to make use of this plugin.

If you’re not already a SnapEngage user, we offer 15-day Free Trials.

Visit our site for more info:

SnapEngage Live Chat

  • Sign up for a free 15-day trial. (No credit card required!)
  • Learn more about SnapEngage Live Chat and our robust feature set.
  • Come chat with us! We’re happy to answer any questions you may have.
sections.installation:
Automatic Installation:

  • You can install this plugin directly from your WordPress dashboard’s ‘Plugins’ section.

Manual Installation:

  • Unzip contents of this .zip file to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

After Installation:

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ section in WordPress.
  2. Go to Settings >> SnapEngage
  3. Check enable. Type in your SnapEngage Widget ID. Click save.
  4. Log in to the SnapEngage Web Client.
  5. Get ready to chat with your visitors!

For more info about using SnapEngage, please see the Getting Started section of our Support Knowledgebase.
sections.faq:
Q: Does this plugin provide a live chat solution?

Not exactly. SnapEngage provides a fantastic Live Chat solution, and this plugin helps you install SnapEngage on your WordPress site. If you don’t already have a SnapEngage account, you’ll need to sign up for a Free Trial to test out the live chat feature.

Q: How can I get a SnapEngage account?

You can learn more and start a 15-day free trial at our website.

Q: I have more questions about SnapEngage!

Feel free to come chat with us! Our chat team is online during normal business hours in both European and North American time zones.

short_description: The easiest way to install SnapEngage Live Chat on your WordPress site! Use it for Sales, Support, or both!
